cinnamon.engine.utils

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.utils.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copier<Point>, Position, Repositionable

    public final class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements Repositionable, Copier<Point>

    A movable point in three dimensions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point()
      Constructs a Point whose coordinates are (0,0,0).
      Point(float x, float y, float z)
      Constructs a Point from the given coordinates.
      Point(Point point)
      Constructs a Point with the same coordinates as another.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)

        Comparison between two coordinates of Float.NaN are treated as true and no distinction is made between positive and negative zeros. Floating point comparison is exact (delta of 0).

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the point with which to compare.
        Returns:
        true if the given object is a point and both points refer to the exact same coordinates.

      • isEqual

        public static boolean isEqual(Point pointA,
                              Point pointB,
                              float delta)

        Checks if two Points are roughly equivalent using a given delta. If corresponding coordinates are NaN, they are considered equal.

        Parameters:
        pointA - first point.
        pointB - second point.
        delta - difference allowed between coordinates before they are no longer considered equal.
        Returns:
        true if coordinates are roughly equivalent.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either of the given points are null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if delta < 0.
